declarations.name: guaranteedAllTransitionend

parameters.name: cb
parameters.description: Callback to trigger when the "transition" has ended.

declarations.description:
Apply a "transitionend" listener to an element that may not transition but
guarantee the callback will be fired either way.

Abstract Overlay base class so that property tyings and imperative API
interfaces can be held separate from the actual class definition.
declarations.name: AbstractOverlay

members.name: open
members.description:
Overloaded imperative API entry point that allows for both the pre-0.37.0
argument signature as well as the post-0.37.0 signature. This allows for
consumers to continue to leverage it as they had been in previous releases
while also surfacing the more feature-rich API that has been made available.

members.name: preventNextToggle
members.description:
An overlay with a `click` interaction should not close on click `triggerElement`.
When a click is initiated (`pointerdown`), apply `preventNextToggle` when the
overlay is `open` to prevent from toggling the overlay when the click event
propagates later in the interaction.

declarations.name: LONGPRESS_INSTRUCTIONS
strategies

members.name: delayed
members.description:
An Overlay that is `delayed` will wait until a warm-up period of 1000ms
has completed before opening. Once the warmup period has completed, all
subsequent Overlays will open immediately. When no Overlays are opened,
a cooldown period of 1000ms will begin. Once the cooldown has completed,
the next Overlay to be opened will be subject to the warm-up period if
provided that option.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the overlay is currently functional or not

members.name: offset
members.description:
The `offset` property accepts either a single number, to
define the offset of the Overlay along the main axis from
the trigger, or 2-tuple, to define the offset along the
main axis and the cross axis. This option has no effect
when there is no trigger element.

members.name: open
members.description: Whether the Overlay is projected onto the "top layer" or not.

members.name: placement
members.description:
Instruct the Overlay where to place itself in
relationship to the trigger element.

members.name: lastRequestSlottableState
members.description:
The state in which the last `request-slottable` event was dispatched.
Do not allow overlays from dispatching the same state twice in a row.

members.name: receivesFocus
members.description:
Whether to pass focus to the overlay once opened, or
to the appropriate value based on the "type" of the overlay
when set to `"auto"`.

members.name: trigger
members.description:
An optional ID reference for the trigger element combined with the optional
interaction (click | hover | longpress) by which the overlay shold open
the overlay with an `@`: e.g. `trigger@click` opens the overlay when an
element with the ID "trigger" is clicked.

members.name: triggerElement
members.description: An element reference for the trigger element that the overlay should relate to.

members.name: triggerInteraction
members.description: The specific interaction to listen for on the `triggerElement` to open the overlay.

members.name: type
members.description: Configures the open/close heuristics of the Overlay.

events.description: announces that an overlay has completed any entry animations
events.name: sp-opened

events.description: announce that an overlay has compelted any exit animations
events.name: sp-closed

events.description: requests to add or remove slottable content
events.name: slottable-request

the next Overlay to be opened will be subject to the warm-up period if
provided that option.

attributes.name: trigger

the overlay with an `@`: e.g. `trigger@click` opens the overlay when an

attributes.name: type

members.name: shouldHidePopover
members.description:
A popover should be hidden _after_ it is no longer on top-layer because
the position metrics will have changed from when it was originally positioned.
